main event: Witnesses reported seeing three strange bright objects above Aliwal North, South Africa on 21 February 1962.
interesting points: The objects were described as looking like rockets and traveling horizontally,The report mentions a fragment of an Atlas rocket that fell near the area on the same day,The objects appeared to merge together before disappearing,The sighting was potentially linked to space efforts involving John Glenn's mission,The sighting was documented by multiple witnesses.
sighted object: three strange bright objects in the sky
witness description: Various witnesses but no specific information provided
